de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base.simple

Class DefaultSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base.simple.DefaultSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener, Session, SessionBase, TransportListener

    public class DefaultSession
extends Object
implements Session
    Default TNC(C/S) session managing a transport connection. This implementation uses an event based approach to handle incoming messages and handshake retry requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DefaultSession.Close
      Runnable which closes a session within the race conditions.
      private class  DefaultSession.Receive
      Runnable which receives and parses a message batch from the underlying connection.
      private class  DefaultSession.Retry
      Runnable which tries to execute a handshake retry.
      private class  DefaultSession.Start
      Runnable which starts the session and initializes the state machine.

    • Method Detail

      • registerStatemachine

        public void registerStatemachine(StateMachine m)
        Description copied from interface: SessionBase
        Registers a state machine to be used by the session for the integrity handshake and connection management. This method is used to initialize the session properly and can only be called once.
        Specified by:
        registerStatemachine in interface SessionBase
        Parameters:
        m - the state machine

        Parameters:
